languages.text: Корабль Вольного Торговца получил многочисленные повреждения в бою с культистами. Футфол — единственная верфь сектора — место, к которому стремится дух раненого корабля.
Many of the systems on the Rogue Trader's ship have suffered damage in the battle with the cultists. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.
languages.original_text: Корабль Вольного Торговца получил многочисленные повреждения в бою с культистами. Футфол — единственная верфь сектора — место, к которому стремится дух раненого корабля.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's ship has suffered serious damage in the battle with the traitors and their pirate accomplices. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.
The Rogue Trader's ship has suffered serious damage in the battle with the traitors and their pirate accomplices. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.
The Rogue Trader's ship has suffered serious damage in the battle with the traitors and their pirate accomplices. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.
Many of the systems on the Rogue Trader's ship have suffered damage in the battle with the cultists. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.
Many of the systems on the Rogue Trader's ship have suffered damage in the battle with the cultists. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.

languages.text: 行商浪人的舰船遭到了邪教徒的袭击，船上的许多系统都受到了损害。受损舰船的机魂渴望前往这片星区唯一的港口——落脚港。
languages.original_text: Many of the systems on the Rogue Trader's ship have suffered damage in the battle with the cultists. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的舰船遭到了叛徒与海盗的袭击，遭受了严重损害。受损舰船的机魂渴望前往这片星区唯一的港口——落脚港。

languages.text: 教団との戦いで、自由開拓者の船のシステムがいくつもの被害を受けた。負傷した船の精霊は、星域で唯一の港であるフットフォールへ行きたいと強く望んでいる。
languages.original_text: Many of the systems on the Rogue Trader's ship have suffered damage in the battle with the cultists. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.

traits.locale_text: 教団との戦いで、自由開拓者の船のシステムがいくつもの被害を受けた。負傷した船の精霊は、星域で唯一の港であるフットフォールへ行きたいと強く望んでいる。

languages.text: Muchos sistemas de la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente han sufrido daños en la batalla contra los cultistas. El espíritu herido de la nave anhela alcanzar el único puerto del sector: el de Paso.
languages.original_text: Many of the systems on the Rogue Trader's ship have suffered damage in the battle with the cultists. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.

traits.locale_text: La nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ha sufrido graves daños en la batalla contra los traidores y sus cómplices. El espíritu herido de la nave anhela alcanzar el único puerto del sector: el de Paso.

languages.text: Viele Systeme des Schiffs {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurden in der Schlacht mit den Kultisten beschädigt. Der verwundete Geist des Schiffes sehnt sich danach, den einzigen Hafen in diesem Sektor zu erreichen ... Footfall.
languages.original_text: Many of the systems on the Rogue Trader's ship have suffered damage in the battle with the cultists. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.

traits.locale_text: Viele Systeme des Schiffs {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurden in der Schlacht mit den Kultisten beschädigt. Der verwundete Geist des Schiffes sehnt sich danach, den einzigen Hafen in diesem Sektor zu erreichen ... Footfall.

languages.text: Bon nombre de systèmes du vaisseau du libre-marchand ont été endommagés au cours du combat contre les cultistes. L'esprit blessé du vaisseau désire rejoindre le seul port du secteur, Castel.
languages.original_text: Many of the systems on the Rogue Trader's ship have suffered damage in the battle with the cultists. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a subi de lourds dégâts lors du combat contre les traîtres et leurs alliés pirates. L'esprit blessé du vaisseau désire rejoindre le seul port du secteur, Castel.

languages.text: Tarikatçılara karşı verilen savaşta Hür Tacir'in gemisindeki birçok sistem hasar aldı. Yaralı geminin ruhu, sektördeki tek rıhtıma olan Binliman'a ulaşmak için can atıyor.
languages.original_text: Many of the systems on the Rogue Trader's ship have suffered damage in the battle with the cultists. The wounded ship's spirit yearns to reach the only port in the sector — Footfall.

traits.locale_text: Tarikatçılara karşı verilen savaşta Hür Tacir'in gemisindeki birçok sistem hasar aldı. Hasarlı geminin sektördeki tek rıhtıma götürülmesi gerek, yani Binliman'a.
